GSD.description:
drm/amdkfd: handle CPU fault on COW mapping

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.9 by commit 883584df581987e7176bfae1c8b276f73c2ca28d. For more details please see the references link.
